name: Space Jumblers
description:
You are a brave captain of the spaceship, who's defendig earth from space invaders! However, these invaders are tricky and they jumble ship's controls from time to time.

Controls
  1. Move left - A or Left Arrow;
  2. Move right - D or Right Arrow;
  3. Shoot - Space;

However, they can change during the fight.

Team
  1. Me as game designer and programmer;
  2. Sava as a composer;

We appretiate any feedback on our game. It was a hard jam, but we did our best.

Source code.

Honored mentions

Art by KenneyNL.
